abstract: University of Mississippi receiver Laquon Treadwell and tackle Laremy Tunsil join players declaring for NFL draft; other college football news noted.

headline.print_headline: Two From Ole Miss Declare for Draft
headline.main: Two From Ole Miss Declare for Draft

snippet: Two Mississippi stars — Laquon Treadwell, who led the Southeastern Conference with 1,153 receiving yards, and left tackle Laremy Tunsil — were among the players to declare for the N.F.L. draft.
lead_paragraph: Two Mississippi stars — Laquon Treadwell, who led the Southeastern Conference with 1,153 receiving yards, and left tackle Laremy Tunsil — were among the players to declare for the N.F.L. draft.
